button.pay.description: Button text for paying the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for viewing order details.

button.query.description: Button text for querying the order.

button.finish.description: Button text for completing the order manually.

button.update.description: Button text for updating the order.

field.amount.description: The point amount of the order.

field.price.description: The point amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of the order.

field.proxy.description: A proxy is an online service used for data transmission via HTTP.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to make a payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message displayed when the order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan the code to complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment via the external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message indicating payment via an external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to payment status and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. Please confirm the customer has completed the payment, do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order indicating this order is still waiting for user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order indicating this order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order indicating this order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order indicating this order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order indicating this order payment has failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website indicating Alipay, Alipay is a form of online payment.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website indicating Stripe payment, Stripe is a form of online payment.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website indicating order management.
